welcome to what's new with EWS I'm Jeff
Barr
I've got four great launches to share
with you today first up two new AWS
regions the first one Cape Town Africa
second one Milan Italy
both these regions feature three
availability zones they've got multiple
ec2 instance types available to you and
dozens of alw services ready to go we're
working on additional regions in Japan
Indonesia and Spain the end of this chat
but is now generally available you can
use this to monitor and interact with
your AWS resources in slack channels and
in chime chat rooms you get alerts run
commands invoke lambda functions and you
can even create eight of your support
cases finally cloud watch synthetics are
now generally available this is a really
cool service so let's you wonder sites
api's and workflows such as checkouts
really easy to use from the console the
CLI the API or a CloudFormation template
to get started you create a canary that
runs either on demand or on a schedule
when the canary runs it invokes a lambda
function lambda function performs the
configured check leaves the output in
cloud watch including screenshots and
HTML archives be sure to check out our
blog post for all four of these launches
to learn some more thank you as always
for watching we love to hear from you
